w :  your room is a mess .  when is the last time you tidied your room ?
m :  it was when linda came over .  she is been so helpful that i simply can ' t do without her .

question: what does the man mean ?
choice: he hasn ' t cleaned his room since linda visited him .
linda is the only person who ever comes to see him .
he ' s been too busy to clean his room .
answer: he hasn ' t cleaned his room since linda visited him .
